com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils

Class DragAndDrop.Payload

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.DragAndDrop.Payload
  • Enclosing class:
    DragAndDrop

    public static class DragAndDrop.Payload
extends java.lang.Object
    The payload of a drag and drop operation. Actors can be optionally provided to follow the cursor and change when over a target. Such Actors will be added and removed from the stage dynamically during the drag operation. Care should be taken when using the source Actor as a payload drag actor.
